cyclone.name: MARIA
cyclone.current_location: about 545 mi ESE of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest, expected to slow and approach the Leeward Islands early in the work-week

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for Antigua, Barbuda, St. Kitts, Nevis, Montserrat, Guadeloupe, Saba, St. Eustatius, St. Maarten, Anguilla; Tropical Storm Watch for St. Lucia, Martinique, Dominica, Barbados, St. Vincent and the Grenadines
weather_observation.warning_coast: None issued as of this advisory
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and southern Leeward Islands; eventual impacts possible across Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola and Bahamas later in the period
weather_observation.first_hazard: None expected at the port within 5 days
